name: Redditbooru Tweaks
description: Removes padding from the viewed images so that the viewing size is maximised. Centers viewed images (almost completely) and makes the info bar on the right 250% narrower. Combine with F11 fullscreen for best effect.
additional_info:
Best used in conjunction with autohotkey script which effectively preloads the next image and maps navigation from arrows to wasd:
https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/5293445/Ordered/4ever/RedditbooruPreload.ahk
Compiled version for those that don't want to have autohotkey installed:
https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/5293445/Ordered/4ever/RedditbooruPreload.exe
